sentences.en: Bud turned the truck around, and started back for Dalton Pond.
sentences.cn: 巴德把卡车掉头，开始返回多尔顿池。

sentences.en: Certain truck gasoline tanks can rupture and burn in a collision.
sentences.cn: 某些卡车的油箱在碰撞时可能发生爆裂并起火。

sentences.en: He pulled to a stop behind a pickup truck.
sentences.cn: 他在一辆皮卡货车后面停了下来。

sentences.en: He put the truck in gear and drove on.
sentences.cn: 他把卡车挂上挡，继续往前开。

sentences.en: He started his working life as a truck driver.
sentences.cn: 他的工作生涯是从当卡车司机开始的。

sentences.en: He would have no truck with deceit.
If all else fails, I could always drive a truck.
sentences.cn: 如果其他都不行，我总还可以开卡车。

sentences.en: Last year the millionth truck rolled off the assembly line.
sentences.cn: 去年，第100万台卡车驶下流水线。

sentences.en: Now and then they heard the roar of a heavy truck.
sentences.cn: 他们不时地听到大卡车的轰鸣声。

sentences.en: The truck had gone off the road and toppled over.
sentences.cn: 那辆卡车冲出马路后就翻倒了。

sentences.en: The truck hit a bump and bounced.
sentences.cn: 卡车开过路面上的隆起处，颠了一下。

sentences.en: The truck left the loading dock with hoses still attached.
sentences.cn: 卡车驶离装货月台时塑料水龙带还连在上面。

sentences.en: The truck lumbered across the parking lot toward the road.
sentences.cn: 卡车隆隆地驶过停车场准备上路。

sentences.en: The truck sways wildly, careening down narrow mountain roads.
sentences.cn: 卡车疯狂地左摇右晃，从狭窄的山路上急冲而下。

sentences.en: The truck was trundling along the escarpment of the Zambesi valley.
sentences.cn: 卡车沿着赞比西山谷的绝壁缓缓行进。

sentences.en: we have no truck with that style of gutter journalism.
sentences.cn: 我们不愿与那类下流的报章杂志来往。
